fishing.zh_TW: 如果你想跟你的朋友出去釣魚但無法， 這個小遊戲會滿足你的需求!
fishing.en_US: If you wanna go fishing w/ your friends but you cant go out, this small game will satisfy your requirements

yt.zh_TW:
想要跟朋友一起在dc上面看youtube嗎? 
那就來試試這個功能吧!
yt.en_US:
Wanna watch youtube on discord w/ your friends? 
Well check out this function!

botinfo.zh_TW: 顯示這個機器人的資訊。
botinfo.en_US: Shows the information of this bot.

help.zh_TW: 幫助您更了解本機器人的功能!
help.en_US: Helps you understand about this bot more!

ping.zh_TW: 顯示機器人的網路延遲。

Bulls&Cows.zh_TW:
Bulls and Cows (1A2B) 是一個猜四位數字的遊戲(數字不重複)，在這個遊戲中你要藉由你猜的數字及機器人給的線索來去判斷正確答案.
如果你想要知道更多有關這個遊戲的玩法，請參考這個網址!
https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/52463/bulls-and-cows
Bulls&Cows.en_US:
Bulls and Cows (1A2B) is a game that you guess for a 4-digit number, all digits are different.
If you want to know more about this game, check out this website!
https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/52463/bulls-and-cows

Ps:In this version A,B refers to Bulls and Cows

connect4.zh_TW:
Connect 4 是一個雙人遊戲，遊戲的目標就是你要將你的棋子在棋盤的六行中選擇一行放下去，並在斜線、水平或垂直方向中將四個棋子連為一線。

使用 cn!connect4 ``@用戶名`` 來去邀請對方與你一起遊玩!
connect4.en_US:
Connect 4 is a two player game. The object is that you drop your chesses inside a 6x7 grid and try to connect 4 same colors in a row, it can be horizontal, diagonal or vertical.

Do cn!connect4 ``@username`` to invite someone to play w/ you!

dice.zh_TW: 隨機生成一個範圍從一到六的數字。

reversi.zh_TW:
黑白棋(陰陽棋)是一個雙人棋類遊戲，遊戲的目標就是嘗試將對方的顏色旗子全部翻成你的顏色的旗子。 

使用cn!reversi ``@用戶名`` 來邀請你的朋友與你遊玩!
reversi.en_US:
Reversi is a two player game. The object is to flip all your opponent's color into your color. 

Do cn!reversi ``@username`` to invite someone to play w/ you!

join.zh_TW: 如果機器人沒有在其他語音頻道裡，機器人會加入你的語音頻道。
join.en_US: Make the bot join your current voice channel if the bot is not in a voice channel.

nowplaying.en_US: Show's the current song that is being played.

pause.zh_TW: 讓機器人暫停播放音樂，再次使用此指令可以回復播放。
pause.en_US: Pause the music that is being played right now. Use this command again to resume it.

play.zh_TW: 使用這個指令來去播放音樂，目前接受yt網址和關鍵字。
play.en_US:
Use this command to play music!
 Yt link and keywords are allowed.

queue.zh_TW: 顯示現在這個伺服器中的播放清單。
queue.en_US: Shows current music queue in the guild.

remove.zh_TW:
從播放清單中移除歌曲。
使用方法: cn!remove {號碼}
remove.en_US: Remove a song from the queue. Syntax: cn!remove {index}

shuffle.zh_TW: 將現在的播放清單打亂。

skip.en_US: Skip the song that is currently being played.

stop.zh_TW: 讓機器人停止播放音樂且離開頻道。
stop.en_US: Bot stops playing music and leave the channel

register.zh_TW: 在此機器人上註冊以開啟更多功能!
register.en_US: Register on this bot in order to unlock more functions!

setlang.zh_TW:
使用此指令以設定你的語言
用法: ``cn!setlang [你的語言]`` 
 目前有zh_TW 與 en_US 兩種語言可供選擇
setlang.en_US:
Use this command to set your perferred language.
Usage: ``cn!setlang [your language]``
 Currently available languages: zh_TW and en_US

zh_TW.channel_first: 請先加入一個語音頻道
zh_TW.channel_alr: 我已經在一個語音頻道裡了
zh_TW.not_playing: 目前沒有音樂正在播放
zh_TW.notin_channel: 我目前沒有在語音頻道裡
zh_TW.same_channel: 你必須要在同一個頻道以使用這個指令
zh_TW.added_song: 已將歌曲 ``{0}`` 加至播放清單
zh_TW.empty_queue: 目前清單沒有東西，請使用 cn!play [網址/關鍵字] 來將歌曲加到清單裡!
zh_TW.song_nf: 找不到編號為 {0} 的歌曲

en_US.channel_first: You have to join in a voice channel first.
en_US.channel_alr: I'm already in a voice channel!
en_US.not_playing: There's currently no song being played right now.
en_US.notin_channel: I'm not in a voice channel right now.
en_US.same_channel: You have to be in the same channel to use this command.
en_US.empty_queue: The Queue is empty, type cn!play [url/keyword] to add songs to queue!
